title: S2 Ep35: Africa's lands of opportunity
itunes:title: Africa's lands of opportunity
description: On average, if you are born in Africa today you have much better chances to succeed than your parents or grandparents. But which countries have the best, and worst, intergenerational mobility? Elias Papaioannou tells Tim Phillips about the four-year hunt for Africa's lands of opportunity.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
